name: Solar System (itch) (pogdog123)
description:
Here is my Solar System project!

I tried to follow the instructions as close as possible, I hope you all enjoy checking it out.

Please note: The WebGL version doesn't have audio due to the fact that I ran into a large number of bugs. I tried fixing it for over 5 hours but wasn't able to do anything to fix it. As far as I know, the windows and Mac builds work.

Credits
